Beautiful home with great views.
We rented it at the last minute, and although they were on vacation themselves, the owners readily responded and communicated well. The directions were easy to follow to find the place. It was well arranged home with sophisticated decor. Simple and Clean comes to mind. Lots of natural light and plenty of lighting for darker times. The rooms accomadated well with nice closet space for any length of stay. They did provide nice white towels (which is beautiful in a crisp hotel but at this lake I would consider something with a tad of color or pattern) hand towels, beach towels and kitchen towels. There are some games but some pieces are missing. The internet was sufficient for our use, but with the lake at the backyard who spends time inside? Especially with a nice lil screened in porch overlooking the lake and sipping wine while the sun sets!!
Now on to that.. we were a tad disappointed the the photos didn't show just how close to the road the house was and with no fence, but after speaking with owner, that was to be resolved AFTER our stay, kinda a bummer since we brought dogs and had no idea, but it will be a nice feature once completed.
The yard is a very large lot but be WARNED.. the house sits atop a very steep hill that has no steps.. you basically have to be a mountain climber to go down from the back porch or go to the front to find a more gradual grade to get to the 2nd level yard where there's a more friendlier incline. There they have a pit set up on gravel with a nice breeze that comes down over the hill. The horseshoe pit was fun too.
The 3rd or lower level to the beach is quite steep as well and has some obstacles that aren't too bad but would be a challenge to older ones or people with hip or knee issues. This is only mentioned because it wasn't clear on the listing. The Beach was nice and one of the nicest that we saw on that cove. Lots of shade and a gradual entry to the water but wear bring shoes because it is rocky. My uncle even enjoyed some great fishing too! We even got to meet friendly neighbors who came to introduce themselves and compliment the house.
Over all a beautiful place, gorgeous views, private, nice beach and pet friendly to boot.
The owners were really nice and easy to work with. We hope to go back sometime in the near future since the fence will be up. I do recommend this place, you really won't be disappointed.
